title: Things
description: A listing of all the things in Nested Clone.

^.*$.description: An entry for a thing, keyed by its ID.

children.description: A catalog of the potential children of this entry.

range.description: A range describing how many of this child should be generated. Inclusive.

chance.description: The chance for this child to be generated at all

label.description: A list of labels to choose from randomly. If unspecified, the ID is used instead.

imagePath.description: A path to an icon to use, starting at docs/images. If unspecified, uses webroot/images/${id}.png

inheritsFrom.description: A list of IDs of other things that this thing should inherit its children from.
